revision.text: Possibly: The analogy of religion, natural and revealed, to the constitution and course of nature. To which are added two brief dissertations: I. Of Personal Identity. II. Of the Nature of Virtue. By Joseph Butler, L. L. D. Rector of Stanhope, in the Bishoprick of Durham. (Dublin : Printed by J. Jones. For George Ewing, at the Angel and Bible in Dame's-Street, M,DCC,XXXVI. [1736]) http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2403627~S1
